LanguageData.BTG_Settings_TraderRotationDesc1: How often orbital traders rotate at TradersGuild settlements.
LanguageData.BTG_Settings_TraderRotationDesc2: Lower values = more variety, but less time to reach distant settlements.
LanguageData.BTG_Settings_UseCustomLayoutsDesc: Generate TradersGuild settlements with less abandoned-looking aesthetics.\nDisable if using other map generation mods or prefer vanilla layouts.
LanguageData.BTG_Settings_EnableCargoVaultDesc: When enabled, cargo vault hatches in shuttle bays can be hacked to access trade inventory.\nWhen disabled, cargo vaults spawn sealed and inaccessible.\nOnly affects newly generated settlements.
LanguageData.BTG_Settings_SentryDroneDesc: Factor of threat points used for additional patrolling sentry drones.
LanguageData.BTG_Settings_ThreatMultiplierDesc: Higher values = more/stronger initial defenders when entering settlements.
LanguageData.BTG_Settings_MinThreatPointsDesc: Prevents initial defender strength from scaling below this value at low wealth.
LanguageData.BTG_Settings_LifeSupportDesc: Power output from orbital LifeSupportUnits. Requires restart.
LanguageData.BTG_Settings_SalvagersRaidWeight: Salvagers raid weight on TG maps: {0}x
LanguageData.BTG_Settings_SalvagersRaidWeightDesc: When assaulting TradersGuild settlements, Salvagers raids become more likely.
LanguageData.BTG_CargoVaultHatch_RelockDesc: Relock the cargo vault. Contents will be returned to station inventory.
